sn14.36:1.2: “Mendicants, the arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the earth element is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn14.36:1.3: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the water element …
sn14.36:1.4: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the fire element …
sn14.36:1.5: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the air element is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn14.36:2.1: The cessation, settling, and ending of the earth element is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.
sn14.36:2.2: The cessation, settling, and ending of the water element …
sn14.36:2.3: The cessation, settling, and ending of the fire element …
sn14.36:2.4: The cessation, settling, and ending of the air element is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.”
